description: Sweet caramelised pineapple is the perfect dessert for a barbecue. Marinated in zesty lime, rum and pepper, the flavours are like no other.
name: Barbecued Pineapple With Black Pepper, Lime & Rum Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pineapple, peeled, halved lengthways, thickly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Place rum, sugar, pepper, zest and 1 cup boiling water in a baking dish and stir to combine. Add pineapple and lime and turn to coat. Stand for 30 minutes to allow flavours to infuse.

Preheat a chargrill pan over high heat. Cook pineapple and lime, reserving marinade in baking dish, for 5 minutes or until golden. Return pineapple to marinade. Bake for 10 minutes or until liquid has reduced and pineapple is tender.
Squeeze limes over pineapple and scatter over biscuits and mint. Serve with yoghurt.
